title: Country Club
content:
Hi

Would you please tell me what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212258im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cc_5938.jpg)

Thank you!

 [‹ Royal Bank of Scotland's new typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212258/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45361 "Go to previous forum topic") [Victorian postcard-style font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212258/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44553 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content:
I thought it was TF Arrow Book with the serifs blown out in the sample. But the R looks different.
